summary: Dramatic orchestral levelup sound both in a world and in the menu
descriptionHtml:
Dramatic orchestral levelup sound both in a world and in the menu
From S. Prokofiev - Montekki and Kapuletti

Testing:
0. Start new game
1. Open console by pressing ~
2. Type \"player.advskill onehanded 999999999\" and press Enter
3. Close console
Now you must advance some levels and hear new sound. Go to levelup menu to hear more of new stuff
author: bsjadhcbas
